instructions: Build the Lakehouse Architecture! Drag each component to its correct layer. The lakehouse combines data lake flexibility with data warehouse performance. Click a placed component to remove it, or drag it to a different zone.
learnings: Storage Layer: Cloud object storage (S3, ADLS, GCS) provides cheap, scalable, durable storage for all your data
Format Layer: Delta Lake adds ACID transactions, time travel, and schema enforcement on top of Parquet files
Compute Layer: Spark Engine (with Photon acceleration) processes data at scale with distributed computing
Serving Layers: SQL Warehouse serves BI tools and analysts, while Notebooks enable data engineering and ML workflows
This layered architecture is the foundation of the Lakehouse paradigm - combining lake flexibility with warehouse reliability
